trans-unit.source: Represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
Connector provides methods and properties that allow you to customize how to draw a set of connectors when an activity designer is rendered at design time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
source or target contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
Gets the bounding rectangle for the connector on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the connector on the workflow design surface.
Gets the value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is modified.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connector is modified; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a read-only collection of points that contains all segments found in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> read-only collection that contains all segments found in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is equal to the specified connector.

Equals verifies that both the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> properties of the two connectors hold references to the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to compare with the current connector.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified connector is equal to the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns an empty array of Rectangle object.
Derived classes populate this collection.
A generic collection of Rectangle objects.
Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Returns a service object of the specified type if it is available.
GetService returns the service object available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
The <xref:System.Type> of the service object to return.
A service object of type serviceType or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified point resides on the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Typically, HitTest indicates whether a user has clicked a point on a connector displayed on a workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to test.
if point resides on the current ; otherwise, .
Invalidates the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> and causes it to be redrawn.

Invalidate causes all contents found in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A> to be included in the update region for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
Changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> height and width using the settings defined in the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the height and width settings to offset the connector.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that layout operations are occurring.
OnLayout clears <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A> and repopulates it with a new range of points.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Renders the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing data.
Used for drawing the Connector when it is dragged from one state to another.
This method is called when a user is creating a connector, moving a middle point or moving an endpoint from one activity to another.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
Coordinates for the segments in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Coordinated for the edit points on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Used for drawing a Connector that is selected by the user.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
Not used.
Coordinates for the edit points on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Gets the designer on which the connecter appears on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the connector appears on the workflow design surface.
Gets the workflow view associated with the connector.
ParentView provides access to the workflow design surface on which the connector appears.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that is associated with the connector.
Performs layout tasks for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.

PerformLayout calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and specifies that the layout update does not need to occur immediately.
Reroutes the connector from source to target if the connector has changed.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> collection that represents the new connector segments to use for rerouting.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
When setting this property the source <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*> does not match the target associated designer.
Source was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
When setting this property the source <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*> does not match the target associated designer.
Target was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
